text: kya tumhen un logon kee khabar nahin pahunchee jo tumase pahale guzare hain, nooh kee qaum aur aad aur samood aur ve log jo unake pashchaat hue jinako allaah ke atirikt koee nahin jaanata? unake paas unake rasool spashti pramaan lekar aae the, kintu unhonne unake munh par apane haath rakh die aur kahane lage, "jo kuchh dekar tumhen bheja gaya hai, ham usaka inakaar karate hai aur jisakee or tum hamen bula rahe ho, usake vishay mein to ham atyant duvidhaajanak sandeh mein grast hai.
